mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_COMMENT (BOARD_CODE, MEMBER_CODE, CONTENT, REGIST_DATE, STATUS) VALUES (#{noticeNo}, #{memberCode}, #{content}, current_date, 1)
mapper.select: SELECT COMMENT_CODE, BOARD_CODE, MEMBER_CODE, CONTENT, REGIST_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, STATUS FROM TBL_COMMENT WHERE BOARD_CODE = #{noticeNo} ORDER BY REGIST_DATE DESC
